notes: Add new endpoints to the 'endpoints' array. Each entry can be a string URL or an object {"url": "...", "headers": {...}}. Replace placeholder URLs with the real export links (use /exports/csv when available).

add_new_here: To add new endpoints: edit this file and append either a string URL or an object with {"url": "...", "headers": {...}, "description": "..."}. For endpoints that require headers (Authorization), pass them in the headers object. Example: {"url": "https://api.example.com/export.csv", "headers": {"Authorization": "Bearer TOKEN"}}
